title: Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier, 1 gallon, Black; low tank indicator; Dish washer safe; Humidity capacity: 142ml/h; Aroma tray; 3 speeds; mechanical knob; covers 320 sq. ft. area, weight: 6.33 lbs
descriptions:
**Breathe Easy with the Sleek Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier - Perfect for Any Room!**

Introducing the Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier, where functionality meets modern design! With its sleek black finish and a generous 1-gallon capacity, this humidifier is both an elegant and practical addition to your home or office space. 

**Key Features:**

- **Efficient Hydration:** Delivering a humidity capacity of 142ml per hour, it effortlessly moisturizes the air, covering an area of up to 320 square feet. Perfect for living rooms, bedrooms, or any medium-sized room that needs a touch of comfort.
  
- **Intuitive Design:** The low tank indicator ensures you'll always know when a refill is needed, saving you from the guesswork and keeping your air consistently fresh.

- **Convenience at Its Best:** Cleaning is a breeze with this dishwasher-safe unit, making maintenance as simple as it gets. Plus, the easy-to-use mechanical knob offers you three-speed settings to customize your comfort level.

- **Aromatherapy Ready:** Infuse your surroundings with your favorite essential oils using the built-in aroma tray. Whether it's lavender for relaxation or eucalyptus for invigoration, this humidifier doubles as your personal aromatherapy diffuser.

- **Safety Assured:** With an empty tank protection feature, you can rest assured that the unit will turn off automatically when it runs out of water. The Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier also employs evaporative technology to provide a safe and pleasant atmospheric enhancement.

- **Filter Friendly:** Compatible with BestAir H62 replacement filters, ensuring your humidifier continues to run at peak efficiency.

- **Lightweight & Portable:** At just 6.33 lbs, it's easy to move from room to room, ensuring that wherever you are, optimal humidity levels follow.

Don't let dry air affect your health and comfort. Add the Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier to your cart today and transform your space into an oasis of freshness and tranquility!

Transform your living space into a haven of comfort with the sleek and efficient Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier. Designed elegantly in classic black, this humidifier blends into any room decor while offering an impressive 1-gallon capacity to ensure lasting moisture throughout the day.

Bid farewell to dry air and embrace a healthier environment with a consistent humidity capacity of 142ml per hour. The Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier gently disperses a fine, cooling mist that covers an expansive area of up to 320 square feet, making it perfect for medium-sized rooms in your home or office.

Tailor your comfort with ease using the mechanical knob, which allows you to adjust between three speed settings to find your ideal mist level. Plus, with the added convenience of an aroma tray, you can infuse your space with your favorite essential oils for a personalized and therapeutic atmosphere.

Never worry about running on empty, thanks to the low tank indicator that alerts you when a refill is needed. Maintenance is a breeze with dishwasher-safe components, ensuring a clean and hygienic humidification experience every time.

Engineered with your safety in mind, this device features empty tank protection, automatically shutting off to prevent damage, and evaporative technology that avoids the spread of impurities in the air. Compatible with BestAir H62 replacement filters, you are assured of a pure and clean mist with every use.

Weighing just 6.33 pounds, the Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier is both portable and durable, ready to provide you with long-lasting relief from dry air. Invest in the comfort and well-being of your home today with this must-have humidifier that promises a fresher, more humidified environment at the touch of a button.

Breathe Easier with Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier – Your Solution for Comfortable Living!

Transform your indoor atmosphere with the sleek and stylish Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier. Designed to enhance your home's air quality, this 1-gallon capacity humidifier is perfect for rooms up to 320 square feet, ensuring that your space remains comfortable and refreshing all day long.

Key Features:
- Vast 1-gallon tank capacity, providing a steady flow of cool mist to keep you comfortable for longer periods without the need for frequent refills.
- Low tank indicator to alert you when it's time to refill, taking the guesswork out of maintenance.
- Dishwasher-safe components for easy and convenient cleaning, ensuring your humidifier remains hygienic and efficient.
- Impressive humidity output of 142ml per hour, creating the perfect balance of moisture in your environment.
- An integrated aroma tray that allows you to add your favorite essential oils, infusing your space with relaxing or invigorating scents.
- Three-speed settings and a simple-to-use mechanical knob, offering full control over the mist output to suit your comfort level.
- Designed in a sophisticated black color, this humidifier will blend seamlessly with any home decor.
- Lightweight at just 6.33 lbs, making it easy to move from room to room as needed.
- Compatible with BestAir H62 replacement filters, ensuring long-lasting performance and easy maintenance.
- Empty tank protection feature to prevent damage and ensure safety when the tank runs dry.
- Utilizes evaporative technology, which is both energy-efficient and effective in distributing moisture evenly throughout your space.

Experience the perfect indoor climate with the Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier. Say goodbye to dry air and hello to a healthier, more comfortable home. Shop now and take the first step towards enhanced well-being and air quality!

**Breathe Easy with the Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier - Your Ultimate Comfort Companion!**

Introducing the Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier, the sleek and stylish solution to maintaining the perfect level of humidity in your home. Designed with a 1-gallon tank capacity and a chic black exterior, this humidifier blends effortlessly into any décor, providing both functionality and aesthetic appeal.

**Key Features:**

- **Efficient Hydration:** With a humidity capacity of 142ml per hour, this device ensures your indoor air stays moist and comfortable, covering a generous area of up to 320 square feet.
- **Smart Indicators:** Never run dry thanks to the intelligent low tank indicator that alerts you when it's time for a refill.
- **Easy Maintenance:** Cleaning is a breeze with dishwasher-safe components, making upkeep simple and hassle-free.
- **Customizable Comfort:** Choose from 3 speed settings to create the perfect environment, easily adjusted with a user-friendly mechanical knob.
- **Aromatherapy Ready:** Elevate your experience with the included aroma tray, designed to diffuse your favorite essential oils for a spa-like atmosphere at home.
- **Safe and Reliable:** Engineered with empty tank protection and evaporative technology, this humidifier is compatible with the BestAir H62 replacement filter, ensuring clean and safe operation.

Weighing in at just 6.33 lbs, the Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier is effortlessly portable, allowing you to bring comfort wherever it's needed most in your home. 

Don't let dry air put a damper on your comfort. Add the Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier to your home today and indulge in the ultimate breathing experience, day in and day out!

Introducing the Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier – your ultimate solution for creating a comfortable and soothing environment in your home or office space. With its sleek black design and versatile features, this 1-gallon humidifier is engineered to cater to your needs for enhanced air quality and comfort.

Key Features:

- **1 Gallon Capacity**: Enjoy long-lasting mist with the generous 1-gallon tank, reducing the need for constant refills.
- **Cool Mist Technology**: The Cool Mist feature safely adds moisture to the air, helping to alleviate dryness and create a more comfortable atmosphere.
- **Low Tank Indicator**: Never get caught off guard. The convenient low tank indicator light alerts you when it's time to refill.
- **Dishwasher Safe**: Cleaning is a breeze with dishwasher-safe components, saving you time and ensuring hygiene.
- **Humidity Output**: Experience optimal humidity with a capacity of 142ml per hour, perfect for maintaining a balanced environment.
- **Aroma Tray**: Personalize your space with your favorite scents using the integrated aroma tray, turning your room into a serene getaway.
- **3 Speed Settings**: Tailor the output to your comfort level with 3 adjustable speed settings, controlled by an easy-to-use mechanical knob.
- **Wide Coverage**: Efficiently humidify a room up to 320 square feet, making it ideal for bedrooms, living rooms, or any medium-sized space.
- **Lightweight Design**: At just 6.33 lbs, this humidifier is easy to move and position wherever you need it most.
- **Compatible with BestAir H62**: Ensure your humidifier is always working at its best with compatible BestAir H62 replacement filters.
- **Empty Tank Protection**: The device smartly shuts off when it detects an empty tank, preventing damage and conserving energy.
- **Evaporative Technology**: Enjoy a self-regulating mechanism that naturally adjusts output to the amount of moisture the air can hold at different temperatures.

Transform your environment with the Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier, designed to elevate your comfort and well-being with each breath you take. Dive into a world of tranquility and breathe easy knowing you've made the right choice for you and your family. Add this must-have appliance to your home today and experience the bliss of perfect humidity!

Introducing the sleek and sophisticated Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier in classic black – your perfect solution for maintaining a comfortable and refreshing atmosphere in your home or office.

Crafted for convenience and efficiency, this 1-gallon capacity humidifier is a powerhouse, effectively covering up to 320 square feet with a fine, cool mist at a rate of 142 milliliters per hour. Whether you are seeking relief from dry air or aiming to improve your indoor climate, this device is designed to cater to your needs.

Key Features:

- **Generous Tank Capacity:** The Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier holds an impressive 1 gallon of water, reducing the frequency of refills and ensuring continuous comfort throughout your day.

- **User-Friendly Indicator:** Equipped with a low tank indicator, never be caught off-guard. This feature alerts you when it's time to refill, so your air stays consistently moisturized without interruption.

- **Hassle-Free Maintenance:** Say goodbye to complicated cleaning routines. This humidifier is dishwasher safe, making cleanup a breeze and giving you more time to relax and enjoy its benefits.

- **Customizable Comfort:** Tailor your environment with a built-in aroma tray that allows you to infuse the mist with your favorite essential oils, creating a fragrant and soothing ambiance.

- **Three Speed Settings:** With three adjustable speeds, controlled by a simple mechanical knob, you can fine-tune the output to suit your personal preference and the needs of your space.

- **Modern Design:** Weighing just 6.33 lbs, the Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier is both lightweight and durable, with an elegant black finish that complements any decor.

- **Smart Features:** Enjoy peace of mind with empty tank protection and evaporative technology that prevents damage and enhances safety.

- **Filter Compatibility:** This model is compatible with BestAir H62 replacement filters, ensuring long-lasting performance and easy maintenance.

Transform your indoor environment with the Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier and breathe easy knowing that comfort and quality are just a mist away. Add this must-have appliance to your home today and experience a new level of air quality and freshness!
